info: There was one injury caused by traffic crashes here between 2009 and 2012.
hcc_text: Macombs Dam Bridge is a pedestrian high crash corridor (top 10% for pedestrian deaths and serious injuries per mile in the Bronx)
intersection: Macombs Dam Bridge at Major Deegan Expressway Sb Exit 5 and Deegan Expressway Sb En Macombs Dam Bridge
